constraints: The given array isguaranteedto be a valid array.
data.problem_statement:
In some arrayarr, the values were in arithmetic progression: the valuesarr[i + 1] - arr[i]are all equal for every0 <= i < arr.length - 1.

A value fromarrwas removed thatwas not the first or last value in the array.

Givenarr, returnthe removed value.
data.title: Missing Number In Arithmetic Progression
